As a swift action, you can give yourself an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on melee attacks, melee damage rolls, and combat maneuver checks. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you take a â€“2 penalty to AC. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

This power replaces the Touch of Chaos power of the Chaos Domain or the Touch of Evil power of the Evil Domain.
